name: Build A-Dream
desc:
A high-performance website for a local landscaping business requiring a digital transformation. Using Astro and React the site delivers exceptional SEO results and lightning-fast load times.

This upgrade has significantly improved the business's online presence and customer engagement.

name: Galacticraft
desc:
A blog website built for Galacticraft, a popular Minecraft mod with over 15 million downloads. It is built with Nuxt and Sanity CMS providing seamless content management capabilities for the mod's development team.

Implemented with my component library to maintain design consistency and speed up development.

name: Plot Ponder
desc:
A social media PWA which enables users to discover and review films and TV shows. Initially created to help mentor my friend with understanding React and working with APIs.

The backend is built using NodeJs and MongoDB to handle user authentication and data persistence

name: Component Library
desc:
Custom component library built for my personal use in projects to maintain design and functionality consistency across projects.

Documented with Storybook, featuring interactive demonstrations.

name: Parking Finder
desc:
An app created for helping users find parking spaces at the cheapest price. Allows users to refine their results through filters or contribute to the collection of data. Developed with Ionic and Capacitor frameworks to deliver a seamless native experience across iOS and Android platforms, featuring interactive Google Maps integration.

The backend is using Nodejs and MongoDB to handle data contributions, scraping of data and user authentication.

name: Yoodee
desc:
Led the development of this website for Yoodee, a social media review app. Built with Nuxt and Strapi for easy content management allowing marketing to have full control over the content.

This promotional website helped attract over 20,000 users to the platform.

name: Impostors
desc:
A fortnite map built using Unreal Engine and Verse programming language. This map adapts the popular game "Among Us", bringing the same gameplay mechanic into Fornite.

It so far has achieved over 500,000 plays.
